<title level="1" right="Spell 2" pfs="Standard">
[Continual Flame](/Spells.aspx?ID=50)
<actions string="Three Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Light" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=100" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 326 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [material](/Rules.aspx?ID=282), [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

**Cost** 6 gp of ruby dust

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** 1 object
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** unlimited
</row>

</column>

---

A magical flame springs up from the object, as bright as a torch. It doesn't need oxygen, react to water, or generate heat.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The cost increases as follows: 16 gp for 3rd level; 30 gp for 4th, 60 gp for 5th, 120 gp for 6th; 270 gp for 7th, 540 gp for 8th, 1,350 gp for 9th, and 3,350 gp for 10th.
